text: ‘me aasrawaha’ yi athi satiyen dani.
matath oone wune othenta enna. mama rupiyal pansiye eewa dekak dunna uge athata.

dutu gamunu rajathumage nandimithra, suranimala, wahasona, gotayimbara, thera puththabhaya, bharana welu sumana, khanjadewa, pussadewa, labhiya wasabha yana dasa maha yodhayan atharin ek ayeku wu gotayimbara kuda kalaye jiwathwa aththe dagonna, godalla godigamuwa pradeshaye bawa pradeshawasinge wishwasayi.

ee wagema widesha sanchara sandaha mage kalayathanagaya mangin narthana kandayam sahabhagi karawanawa.ee awastha ganath tikak kiyamuda?sampradayika narthana danuma daruwanta laba dima wagema lokayata ape watina de penwanna labimath wasanawak. 2001 wasare baෲnayi hi pawathi podu rajya mandaliya kala ulela, 2003 wasare china kala ulela, 2004 wasaredi polanthaye pawathi loka lama jana natum ulela wagema sama wasarakama thayilanthaye rajathumage saha rajinage upan dina uthsawaya sandaha ape deshiya narthana anga samangin sahabhagi wenawa.indiyawe bangalor kala ulela wagema buddhagayawa, sawath nuwara, baranasa katina pujothsawa sandaha wasara 05 ka sita hewisi kandayam saha narthana kandayam sahabhagi karanna awasthawa uda wela thiyenawa.

anagathayedi thorathuru thakshana kshethraya thula siyalu dena siya thakshanaya huwamaru karaganimin katayuthu karanu athi bawa sandahan kala amathyawaraya kiya sitiye eya merata thakshanika wardhanayata mahath pitubalayak wanu athi bawayi.
oba wannawunta danuma dimada mata awashya natha.

paksha bhedaya nisa gama rata bedi thibena deshapalana sanskruthiya apa wenas kala yuthu bawath thaman janadhipathiwaraya lesa katayuthu kirimedi shri lanka, yu. en. pi, je. wi. pi. aadi washayen kisidu wenas kirimak nokarana bawa janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahatha pereda (23) polonnaruwedi pawasiya.

me hama pada walakma siya dahas warayak kiyawanna athi mama.ee hama welawakama mage as kandulin pirenawa.poth, mama aasa karana thawath de upandineta thagi widiyata labunath, hama awuruddema mama balan inne ammagen me thagga labenakal.

mamath aasama deyak.
ma hithanne lokaye aandu me thathwayen prathilabha laba gatha yuthu bawayi.
me pilibandawa adahas dakwu janadhipathi upadeshakayeku wana andi arif pawasuwe harisan fod ge sammukha sakachchawe di amathiwarayata kiyannata ida labune wachana kihipayak pamanak bawayi.
nasena swabhawaya aththeya, nonasena swabhawayawu nirwanayak weda eyama sathyayi.
me wana witath " rajaye wada wenuwen anthima satheta udaw karannemi" yana yahapath sithiwilla mage le nahara siyallatama ka wadi thibini.
kularathna widyalayiya mathawa shi්ra lankawe adwithiya widyasthanayak bawata path kirima,yana dakmata anuwa yamin widyalaya nawa mawathakata yomu kirime itha dushkara karya aarambha karana ladi.
eeta amatharawa samanya janathawa ha gowin the waga kirimata hen aswaddimata rata pura akkara 20000k pamana allagena thibenawa.

nimal hemasiri perera yana aya awastha dekaka di rupiyal miliyana 70k manthri namal rajapaksha mahathage ginumata bara kara athi bawatath wimarshana anawaranaya kara athi athara, awastha thunaka di rupiyal miliyana 60k, 38k saha 80k kishin ramachand butani yana ayata nimal perera yana ayage ginumata bara kara athi bawath ema mudal butani yana ayata ayath galkisse athi parchas 26.3ka idama nimal pererata ayath en kapital aayathanayata mila di ganimata laba dun bawatath owun prakashawala di dakwa atha.

tram ratha palakawarayeku wana adolfus harbat fedrik norman apalroth nohoth bart apalroth mahatha wisin ohu snanaya kirima sandaha bhawithayata ganu labu baldiya upayogi karagena sini saha jelatinyoda ganimin palamu warata jeli kata sakas karana ladi.pasuwa eewa ohuge tram rathaya gaman ganna sidni pradeshaye geyin geta gos wikunana ladi.1917 warshayedi apalroth mahatha ohuge nishpadana katayuthu sandaha kuli godanagillak yoda gath athara 1926 di albat fransis lanarts mahatha samanga ekwa pudgalika wyaparayak arambauha.ema awadhiyedi guwanyana nawa athdakimak wu bawinda apalroth mahatha aakashatharanaya pilibanda dadi loliyek wu bawinda,ohuge mema jeli nishpadanaya eroplen jeli namathi sannam namayen nam karana ladi.[4]1934 warshayedi ohu tayigar mothnamathi guwanyanaya yoda ganimin dushkara pradesha sandaha eroplen jeli beda dunneya.eroplen jeli sandaha karana lada athisarthaka welanda pracharana wyaparaya pasukaleka holdan sabha wejimayit aayathana men dawantha jathika peraliyak[4]kirimatada samath wuni.

- tharmidoriyan prathicharaya 24 juli 1794 - diswit bhumer kumanthranaya 9 nowambar 1799 - senet sabhawa wisin napoliyan bonapat adhirajaya lesin prakasha kirima 18 mayi 1804 wyawaharika mudala pransha frank luwi kapiten (1800) wisin sakas kerunu pranshaye sithiyama abhinawayen pihituwunu jathika sammelanaya wisin 1792 sapthambar 22 dinadi palamu pransha janarajaya (pransha: prumiyar ripublik fronses) sthapanaya keruni. 1804 di palamuwana napoliyan raja yatathe palamu pransha adhirajyaya prakashayata path kerena thuru palamu janarajaya pawathini.
